content: Most Armor and Gear can be crafted after you beat specific bosses or enemies. However, some have to be found throughout the game's open world.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Armor_and_Gear.md', within the main section titled 'Armor and Gear'.
The content is as follows:
Most Armor and Gear can be crafted after you beat specific bosses or enemies. However, some have to be found throughout the game's open world.
